record.jsxtip: Fires after the value of this color picker has changed through user interaction.

record.jsxtext: the browser event resulting in the value change, instance of jsx3.gui.Event
either 'h' for a hue selection or 'sb' for a saturation/brightness selection

record.jsxtip: fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
